short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block ads and remove posts with specified keywords from your LinkedIn feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clean up your LinkedIn feed using inFilter.

Features:-
- Remove posts containing any of the keywords specified by you
- Auto remove "Promoted Posts"
- Auto remove "Recommended for you" items
- Option to remove "Suggested Posts"

This extension helps you save your attention, time, and energy by blocking any posts that you do not want to see, e.g. political, religious, or any kind of undesired content.

Example keywords:-
thrilled to announce
linkedin family
agree?
